name: Top Burger
description: Top Burger is an exciting fast food simulation game. You just opened a burger restaurant, let's see if you can put together burgers fast enough to satisfy your ever growing number of customers!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: Intel Celeron Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 x64 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GT 730 Storage: 100 MB available space
